messages.text: "It's Niiya again. I talked to Pete and he has some ideas he will discuss with you when he returns. In the mean time, if the mayor is willing I would like an officer to take a report on what occurred to just document the event and the mayors perceptions on it. Please let me know if he wants to proceed and when a good time would be."
"Ok. I'll check in"

"It's Jeff Niiya. Regarding the REDACTED threats, employees had already called BOEC and we had an officer there apparently. It has been a long time issue with an employees ex-husband. She already has an RO and we are looking into if there was a violation to make an arrest."
"Thank you sir"

"Good morning it's Jeff Niiya. Getting calls from the owner of all the spaghetti factories regarding the protest at ICE building. I'm going to call him back but suggest he call Mayor's office and ask for you. Just wanted to give a heads up and make sure you're ok with it"
"Yes, that's fine. Thanks for the heads up "
"Also just got off the phone with Dale and Stu...they are going to be putting up a fence around their property. This will probably spur a confrontation "
"Yes dale called and told me. "
"Ok"
"Lt. any dust up or appearance yet?"
"Joey just showed up with 5 others. Calm right now. Talking with protesters "
"Thanks for update. How many PPB on scene?"
"Me right now. My officers 2 blocks down the street "
"We're not blocking streets correct?"
"FPS is like usual. Not us"
"How's it looking. Heading home but contact me whenever "
"It's calm. Joey and his group talking with protesters. That small group who wanted to be arrested just crossed the line and was arrested by FPS. No issues "
"Any updates?  How many individuals are at the camp if you know. "
"No idea. I told my patrol officers to just drive by and not get out on foot. I don't want to cause alarm at the camp for no reason."
"What time is central roll call?"
"Sorry for the delay. Roll call for what? "
"Afternoon shift. "
"It's at 4 pm. Sorry for the confusion "
"Mayor addressed officers at roll call thanking them. Hope they received it well "
"Sorry I was not there. I was in a meeting upstairs. Did not get a chance to talk with anyone after. Glad the Mayor was able to see some of the officers and sergeants."
"Please call me when you get a moment. Thx"
"Ok. Everything alright?"
"I'll call in 10"
"Have a concern about the fence issue at Macadam "
"No rush"
"Do we have officers ready?"
"I gave it to my sergeant to staff. Let me verify. Is the fence down?"
"I don't think it is yet. Just talked to trolley guy and he said it's still filthy. I'll confirm on fence. "
"2 officers on the way"
"Heard you are looking for timeline info on Gibson's movements tomorrow. I heard on one of his videos they hope to leave the Fred Meyers In Vancouver with the first bus around 10 am"
"How many people are coming to city hall?"
"CIU is believing 30-100. However, Facebook shows 287 going. I could personally see 150ish coming between the 2 protest groups"
"Good morning. I would like to discuss with you the protest issue on 4th ave. I have ideas but need direction from your office "
"Ok. I'll be available at 9"
"Ok sounds good"
"Sahli just asked me if we would maybe want to just have PPS post it as a camp to be cleaned? "
"24 hour posting by this afternoon so it would be cleaned tomorrow afternoon."
"We can start with that yes"

"Ok I will ask our NRT team to coordinate that. Police will be engaging with them as well throughout the day to encourage them to clean up and remove items before the scheduled time. If blatant violations are seen we will address those. The large sign and hammock still might have to be addressed by BDS unless we get authorization "
"From mark:  REDACTED"
"Perfect. Glad I remembered corrected and gave you accurate info"
"Does Dorothy have to trespass them or are you good to go?"
"Normally during business hours we use G4S or Dorothy. Technically we can, but generally use that after hours when we 'represent' the city as most bureaus are closed "
"Ok. I'll have G4S trespass them. "
"We are happy to assist and ensure the safety of them. If it is unsafe and have the authorization from the Mayor's office we can take on that role"
"Cleared up now. Thank you"
"It sounds like it moved to Chapman Park. We will continue to monitor and see what happens this afternoon. "
"Can you tell me an accurate account of patriot prayer and antifa for aug 4"
"May I call you?"
"Got your email. Thanks. "
"Also, do we have a beat on PP returning anytime soon?"
"You bet. Let me know if you get further info"
"I have not heard of PP coming anytime soon. They are in Seattle this weekend "
"Ok getting some folks over there in a few. None of the NRT Officers are available so trying to get patrol resources. "
"Yes sir "
"Can we please have the protesters move all their junk and take stuff off trees ASAP. Thanks bud. "
"Yup. I talked at roll call today about continued enforcement. I'll get some people over there. NRT is working so have the best unit to enforce here"
"Thanks bud "
"just talked to Sahli and PPS is on the way to abate the stuff. Lucas in One Point is aware and working with us on this. Will be taken care of soon."
"Any word on the location of the protest yet?  Where PP is going to locate?"
"They have a permit for Terry Schrunk on Sat. They say no march, so this should stay on the area of the parks"
"Thank you. Do we have a time set yet?"
"I believe the supervisors briefing is at 1100 hr. My email is all messed up right now and can't verify. I make sure you're told"
"Understood. But was also checking if you knew what time Gibson was going to show up "
"Ah, sorry. Misunderstood. He has not communicated with me about Sat. "
"Are you hearing anything on Twittersphere re: Joey Gibson and coming on Thursday?"
"Good morning. I'm in Salem at a training. Haven't looked. Let me see and I'll get back to you shortly. "
"Sounds good. Thanks. "
"Quick search and nothing from Joey specifically but Haley Adams and her group look like they will be there."
"Gentlemen, can we meet maybe before the 1pm to go over the audio for identification purposes?"
"I'll come to you "
"I am free"
"Coming to you. What floor?"
"Can we schedule a time to talk tomorrow?"
"Of course sir. Just let me know when and where "
"Let's do 1pm"
"Copy. "
"Sure "
"Might be running about 10 late but I'll be there. "
"Ok"
"FYI"

"Portland friends-    Copy/Paste: PDX safety alert: Joey Gibson and his goons are in town, looking for "anyone wearing a mask". He posted on his own timeline for any location of anyone matching that description. Apparently some of his members got the shit kicked out of them on Friday while they were attempting to disrupt an IWW Hall meeting. They've become unhinged and can't handle it. They've been all over town harassing people that they think belong to Antifa or are sympathetic to anti-Patriot Prayer causes. They are harassing homeless people, and "feminists with bright, multi-colored hair". BE SAFE"
"I am not sure he is on Portland now. But it is accurate he has encouraged people to pull the masks off of Antifa members"
"Thanks. "
"Wanted to alert you to this threat against Mayor Wheeler - https://twitter.com/leftkist/status/1088233111232475136?s=19"
"Is this enough for an arrest?"
